0110110101010010 0010110010011111 1 -> sum: 1001100111110010, cout: 0

1011111000101101 1101001000011110 0 -> sum: 1001000001001011, cout: 1

1000010110001000 0011110000010001 0 -> sum: 1100000110011001, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
